identificationInfo.resourceName: Bilingual (Spanish English) Speech synthesis HTS models
identificationInfo.description: This database contains Bilingual (English and Spanish) Festival HTS models. Models were trained with 9h of speech from 2 female bilingual speakers and 2 male bilingual speakers. Each speaker recorded 2h 15 min per language. The speech data can be found in the TC-STAR Bilingual Voice-Conversion Spanish Speech Database and in the TC-STAR Bilingual Expressive Spanish Speech Database.
